OrgName.entry: EDWARD STREET FLATS AND ST GEORGES TENANTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Represents tenants' interests in the Edward Street Flats area.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues 12noon (lunch club with bingo afterwards), Wed 10am-12noon (English as a second language class), Thurs at 4.30pm (youth club), Fri at 7.30pm (bingo), 2nd Tues in alternate months (general meeting with councillor present)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 3
